'''Mosco Burrows''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Mosco was the eldest child of [[Milo Burrows|Milo]] and [[Peony Baggins|Peony Burrows]]. He was present at Bilbo's famous [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Birthday Party]] at the age of just fourteen.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>
